title: How to automatically unlock your Apple Watch with your iPhone
content:
One of the many reasons people invest in Apple products is how tightly connected they are. When you buy an iPhone or an Apple Watch, you know that these devices will communicate with your Mac on a system level. This solid ecosystem allows users to seamlessly transfer data and hand off tasks between their iDevices.

The post How to automatically unlock your Apple Watch with your iPhone appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Here's how to automatically unlock Apple Watch with your iPhone, without needing to input its security PIN on the tiny screen.
